alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 9:38PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yell County through 1015 PM CST... At 938 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fourche Valley, or 15 miles southwest of Danville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Mt Nebo State Park... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Mosley... Belleville... Corinth... Ranger... Wing... Kingston... Bluffton... Rover... Sunlight Bay Park... Carter Cove Park... Chula... Macedonia in Yell County... Mt George... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for western and central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest
